attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stamp duty is yet another of the stealth taxes which raked in 5.5 billion for the chancellor's coffers last year. The homeowner is becoming the new whipping boy of the government, much the same way as the motorist. It's about time it all stopped and the government started to reward people for trying to get on in life rather than penalise them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
